meanings.sent1: The prodigiousness of the mountain was awe-inspiring.

meanings.definition: Extraordinary in bulk, quantity, or degree
meanings.sent1: The prodigiousness amount of books in the library was overwhelming.
meanings.sent2: His prodigiousness appetite led him to finish the entire pizza.
meanings.sent3: The prodigiousness number of balloons filled the room with color.
meanings.sent4: The prodigiousness storm flooded the streets with rain.
meanings.sent5: The prodigiousness collection of stamps filled the entire album.

meanings.definition: Impressively great in size, force, or extent
meanings.sent1: The prodigiousness strength of the wrestler was unmatched.
